archimate:BusinessFunction.name: ICT Department
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
Manage all IT related needs for the Company, from the solution identification stage to feasibility study, solution design, internal custom development vs tender technical writing and evaluation, purchase, deployment and operation. The IT department is completely responsible for the applications developed in-house. The operation & maintenance activities of commercial (off-the-shelf) applications are outsourced to the external partners / vendors
When a new solution is required by any department, IT will have to analyse the technical requirements to decide whether this will be outsourced externally or developed internally. IT is responsible for prioritizing the various initiatives
